page.title: 07Recreation in Congleton
page.content: {Congleton}has become more adapted to sport and leisure in recent years. In the area studied the main attraction is the Leisure Centre. Nearby is{Congleton's}park. This covers an area of one and a half acres. Within this area are various recreational facilities for children and adults. {Congleton}has a community centre which acts as a youth club and holds a number of different activities. Other clubs in{Congleton vary from computers and BMX bikes to bowls and fencing. One of the newest clubs is the Giantswood Squash Club. Originally it was an old farmhouse. The club holds discos and barbecues and has proved very succesful as have most clubs around{Congleton.
